title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not provide both the correct answer and a valid justification equivalent to the following.

· Disagree. Since D is in group 16, the compound has 34 total valence electrons, which is not consistent with a tetrahedral geometry. Rather, the geometry would be see-saw with four bonds and one lone pair around the central atom.

The response provides both the correct answer and a valid justification equivalent to the following.

· Disagree. Since D is in group 16, the compound has 34 total valence electrons, which is not consistent with a tetrahedral geometry. Rather, the geometry would be see-saw with four bonds and one lone pair around the central atom.
